amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to make it unlawful for an industrial facility to introduce PFAS into a sewage treatment system without first disclosing information about that substance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to make it unlawful for an industrial facility to introduce PFAS into a sewage treatment system without first disclosing information about that substance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Delgado.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
